name: Yet Another Tetris Remake
description:
This is a small project I made while learning C++ !

First time using a library to make a game without an engine.

Definitely not the most polished nor the best looking game i've ever made but it's alright

The game is mainly inspired by the raylib sample Tetris you can find here : 

https://www.raylib.com/games/loader.html?name=sample_tetris

-------------

Fill all the empty space using falling pieces in order to have the best score !

You lose when a piece is placed at the top of your screen

CONTROLS :

Enter : Start the Game

P : Pause

Directional arrows : Move / Rotate the pieces
